p: For the first 3 winters at San Agustin, we disposed only of the total number of individuals captured during each trapping session. We obtained 100 plausible data sets for which the first 3 years trapping day counts of individuals were drawn by a multinomial distribution whose sum matched that of individuals captured at the trapping sessions level (details in Supplementary Appendix S1). Model selection was performed for each data set separately.
